sense.def:
Izraz
what
lahko uporabljamo v vprašanjih, ko prosimo za podatke.

Z izrazom
what
začnemo tudi odvisne vprašalne in trdilne stavke.

seg.quote: I asked her what had happened.
I don't know what to do.
We didn't know what bus to get.

sense.def:
Izraz
what
uporabljamo na začetku odvisnih stavkov, ki nadomeščajo osebek, predmet ali stavčno določilo.

seg.quote: A computer can only do what you have programmed it to do.
What he really needs is a nice cup of tea.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
what
povemo, da govorimo o celotni količini nečesa.

seg.quote: I've spent what money I had.
It took what I could give.

sense.def:
Izraz
what
uporabljamo v vzklikih, s katerimi izražamo svoje mnenje o nečem.

Nekateri uporabijo vprašalnico
‘What?’
, kadar želijo, da nekaj ponovimo, ker niso dobro slišali.
What
ni tako vljuden izraz kot
pardon
ali
sorry
.

seg.quote: ‘Do you want another coffee?’—‘What?’—‘Do you want another coffee?’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
‘What’
lahko pokažemo svoje presenečenje ali nejevero.

seg.quote: ‘Could I see you?’—‘What, right this minute?’

sense.def:
Izraz
what about
uporabimo, kadar nekaj predlagamo ali ponudimo.

Izraz
what if
uporabimo na začetku vprašanja o posledicah nečesa, zlasti nečesa nezaželenega.

seg.quote: What if I miss the train?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
what with
napovemo razloge za določene okoliščine, zlasti če so nezaželene.

seg.quote: What with paying for lunch and the theatre tickets, I'm very short of cash.

sense.def:
Neko osebo lahko imenujemo
what's his name
ali
what's her name
, kadar se ne spomnimo imena;
